author: Alice Walker
message: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
title: Thought of the day

author: Charles Chesnutt
message: Impossibilities are merely things which we have not yet learned.
title: Thought of the day

author: Japanese proverb
message: Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare.
title: Thought of the day

author: Confucius
message: The Superior Man is aware of Righteousness, the inferior man is aware of advantage.
title: Thought of the day
